title: robofleet-dashboard
description: The robofleet-dashboard repository hosts a web-based interface built using JavaScript, Python, HTML, and CSS, designed as a project to visualize and interact with data from the Robofleet robotics platform. This dashboard aims to provide users with a real-time view of robot status, sensor data, and other relevant information, facilitating improved monitoring and control of robotic fleets.

title: crud-expense-tracker
description: This expense tracker, built with JavaScript, CSS, and HTML, offers a simple CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) interface for managing personal finances. It's designed as a project-based demonstration of CRUD operations and features a clean, user-friendly interface potentially leveraging Material-UI for enhanced aesthetics and usability, making it a practical tool for tracking spending and a valuable learning resource for web development.

title: devboard
description: Devboard is a modern, full-stack project management application built with Next.js 14 (using the pages router), TypeScript, and styled with Material-UI (MUI). It leverages React Query for efficient data fetching and management, providing a smooth and organized interface for tracking tasks and collaborating within a team. This repository showcases best practices for developing robust web applications with these popular technologies.

title: raven-v2
description: Raven-v2 is a project built with TypeScript and JavaScript focused on [insert the main purpose or functionality of the project here, e.g., "creating a streamlined task management application" or "developing a real-time collaborative document editor"]. This repository explores [mention a key feature or technology used, e.g., "modern front-end development techniques" or "efficient data synchronization strategies"] to achieve [mention the project's main goal or intended outcome, e.g., "a highly performant and user-friendly experience" or "a robust and scalable solution"].

title: NextJs-Dashboard
description: NextJs-Dashboard is a project built using Next.js, TypeScript, CSS, and JavaScript to create a dynamic and responsive dashboard interface. This repository showcases best practices for structuring a modern web application with a focus on server-side rendering, type safety, and clean styling. It serves as a practical example and starting point for developers looking to build robust and scalable dashboard applications.

title: sleep-debt-tracker
description: Sleep Debt Tracker is a project built with TypeScript, JavaScript, HTML, and CSS to help users visualize and manage their sleep debt. This application allows users to track their daily sleep hours and compare it against their ideal sleep needs, providing a clear picture of their accumulated sleep debt over time. It's a practical tool for anyone looking to improve their sleep habits and overall well-being using a modern, TypeScript-based web application.

title: next-idea-board
description: Next-idea-board is a project utilizing TypeScript, CSS, and JavaScript to create a dynamic and collaborative idea management platform. Built with a focus on project management and brainstorming, this web application allows users to easily capture, organize, and develop innovative ideas within a team environment. This repository provides the codebase for setting up and running your own personalized idea board.

title: resume
description: This repository contains the LaTeX source code and generated HTML for my resume. It serves as a personal project demonstrating clean design principles in document creation, utilizing TeX for professional formatting and HTML for web accessibility, reflecting skills relevant to project and document management. You can view the final HTML version online.

title: jovian
description: Jovian is a Python-based CRUD application built with Flask and PostgreSQL, designed as a learning project to demonstrate fundamental web development principles. It leverages HTML, CSS, and shell scripting for its front-end and deployment, focusing on creating, reading, updating, and deleting data within a PostgreSQL database, offering a practical example of full-stack development using Python.

title: Map-Visualisation
description: Map-Visualisation is a project showcasing interactive map visualizations using HTML and Python. This repository demonstrates how to create dynamic and informative maps for data representation, focusing on practical application and data visualization techniques. The project serves as a learning resource and a foundation for building custom map-based applications.

title: next-voting
description: Next-voting is a full-stack web application built with Next.js, TypeScript, CSS, and JavaScript designed to provide a simple and intuitive platform for creating and participating in various voting processes. This project showcases a practical implementation of modern web development technologies and explores various aspects of project management, offering a functional and engaging voting experience for users.

title: genietalks
description: GenieTalks is a web application leveraging the Gemini API, built with TypeScript, Vite.js, and Express.js, to provide users with an engaging and intuitive project for interacting with AI. This repository showcases a modern web development stack including HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, offering a practical example of integrating AI functionalities into a front-end interface.

title: finance-with-python
description: This repository, built with Jupyter Notebook and Python, contains various finance-related projects and analyses. It serves as a practical exploration of financial concepts using Python, covering topics like portfolio optimization, risk management, and potentially other quantitative finance applications. Whether you're a finance student or a Python enthusiast, this collection offers hands-on experience in applying Python to real-world financial problems.

title: atg-world
description: ATG-World is a dynamic web project built with TypeScript, JavaScript, HTML, and CSS, focused on creating an interactive and engaging experience. This repository showcases a project exploring [mention specific feature or purpose if gleaned from README, e.g., "dynamic data visualization" or "a gamified learning platform"].  It leverages modern web technologies to deliver [mention key characteristic, e.g., "a responsive" or "a performant"] and user-friendly interface.

title: ros-log-viewer
description: ros-log-viewer is a web-based tool for visualizing and analyzing ROS (Robot Operating System) log files, providing a user-friendly interface to easily identify errors, warnings, and debug information. Built with JavaScript, Python, HTML, and CSS, this project offers a searchable and filterable view of log data, enhancing the debugging and monitoring process for ROS applications.

title: iot-asset-tracking
description: This repository hosts a modern, full-stack web application built with Next.js, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS, leveraging Supabase for backend services. It's designed as an IoT asset tracking solution, providing a user-friendly interface to monitor and manage the location and status of various assets. The project showcases best practices in Next.js development with a focus on clean architecture and efficient data handling, making it a valuable resource for learning or adapting to similar tracking applications.

title: dynamic-event-calendar
description: dynamic-event-calendar is a JavaScript-based project showcasing a dynamic and interactive event calendar built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. This repository provides a functional calendar implementation that allows users to easily manage and visualize events, making it a useful example for learning about front-end development and calendar UI implementation.

title: fruit-seller
description: Fruit-Seller is a full-stack e-commerce platform built with Next.js 14 (using the Pages Router), TypeScript, and React, offering a modern and type-safe approach to online fruit sales. Leveraging Material UI (MUI) for a clean and responsive UI, and React Query for efficient data fetching and caching, this project provides a practical example of developing a complete e-commerce solution.
